name: Strange Shadows of Mind
description:
The main character is searching for help in a clinic specialized in mental diseases. The clinic is located near a small village on the coast.

The game itself is going to be some form of a life simulator mixed with nightmares.

The game could be played in English and German and is currently under development.

Trigger warning:

- vicious voices

- severe depression

- self-harm

... and more. So be cautious before playing!

Thanks for the visit and stay safe!
